availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia Disponet in Mercer County, Kentucky, in January 1860. Father of John J. Disponet, Richard Disponet, and James A. Disponet. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Resident of Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 303A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 673.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Precinct 4, p. 485B.
Find A Grave, "David Disponett (1829-1895)," Memorial #46337049, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46337049/david-disponett (accessed July 8, 2021).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191864.
